Articles.Content: My gravity is weird and it got switched on on one world and don’t know how to stop it

Hello, and welcome to the forums!

I took the liberty of moving your question to its own thread, since the one where you posted had been dead for a long time and this will help keep responses more relevant to your problem.

Can you provide a bit more detail? Are you running any mods? Which world? Define "weird"? Exactly what are you observing?
